name: Lowestoft Fibre Network
description:
This project involved a Fibre to the Home (FTTH) network, covering 30,000 homes with both underground and overhead installations serviced via the Fibre Exchange.

Scope of Work:
- Installation and excavation of public highways, footways, and private land.
- Installation of fibre optic cables in new and existing highways.
- Ductwork and cable installations in public and private buildings.
- Street cabinet installations and overhead pole access.

Pod-Trak focused on risk control by updating the Project Hazard Register, ensuring high-quality delivery with an excellent Health & Safety record. Close engagement with the local authority helped minimize disruption to the public and businesses.

Key Stats:
- Excavation of 180,000m of track.
- Delivered on time and within budget, leading to another major project award.
